title: Britain’s 90s Housing Boom Handed Rich Kids Best Jobs, IFS Says
description: Equality campaigners have long highlighted how British families who made a fortune during the housing boom of the late 1990s and 2000s used the windfall to give their children a leg up on the property ladder. Less well known is that the same property wealth helped those kids bag the best jobs.
content: Equality campaigners have long highlighted how British families who made a fortune during the housing boom of the late 1990s and 2000s used the windfall to give their children a leg up on the property ladder. Less well known is that the same property wealth helped those kids bag the best jobs.
